mapper.select: select * from t_account_his where account_his_id = #{accountHisId} and account_no = #{accountNo}
select * from t_account_his where third_no = #{thirdNo} and account_no = #{accountNo}
select group_concat(id) as accountHisIds,sum(amount) as sum from t_account_his where account_no = #{accountNo} and account_status = 'DEAL'

select ifnull(sum(amount),0) as "totalAmount", count(1) as "totalCount" from t_account_his where account_no = #{accountNo} and complete_sett = 1 and allow_sett = 0 and date(create_time) <= date_add(#{collectDate}, INTERVAL -#{riskDay} DAY)
mapper.update: UPDATE t_account_his set complete_sett = 0,version = version + 1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and complete_sett = 1 and allow_sett = 0 and date(create_time) <= date_add(#{collectDate}, INTERVAL -#{riskDay} DAY)
